title: Underground Mine Operators (Waihi Operation)
description:
Great residential location
Permanent and varied roles for experienced operators
50/50 roster
The role
Our Waihi Operation has an exciting opportunity for experienced Underground Mine Operators to join a team that is committed to achieving an injury free work environment and have a high regard for personal safety and the safety of their workmates.
The Waihi Operation runs a 50/50 roster which gives you a great work life balance and the chance to enjoy living in a fantastic location.
There are a number of experienced roles that we are looking to fill, including:
Jumbo Operators
Bogger Operators
Charge-Up Operators.
Whilst working here you will have the opportunity to grow your career, and in addition to exciting and challenging opportunities, OceanaGold Waihi offers competitive salaries and great benefits.
If you are looking for a new challenge and thrive on teamwork and working safely, then we want to hear from you!
The successful candidate will have the following:
Commitment to workplace health and safety
Attention to detail
Quick thinking
Problem solving capabilities
Full class 1 driver's licence
Ability to pass a pre-employment medical including physical assessment and drug and alcohol
OUR VALUES: 
RESPECT 
| 
ONE TEAM
 | 
CONTRIBUTE 
| 
KNOWLEDGE
